content.webTitle: 'We think it's cute': the Tokyo husband and wife who match outfits

fields.headline: 'We think it's cute': the Tokyo husband and wife who match outfits
fields.bodyText: While one bold outfit makes a fashion statement, two matching outfits makes double the impact. Married couple @masaunti and @takahira1027 are “well known personalities in the Tokyo street fashion scene”, according to @TokyoFashion, a popular Instagram account that celebrates Japanese street style. The pair love dressing in co-ordinated outfits, and have made regular appearances on the account, wearing eye-catching styles while out and about in Harajuku and Shibuya. @masaunti says he has always liked colourful clothes. “I don’t think I have to wear plain clothes because I am an adult. I think it’s elegant and cute, we want to enjoy it together by matching outfits.” The couple use the hashtags #matchingoutfits, #couplegoals and #enjoywithmywife Follow Guardian Cities on Twitter, Facebook and Instagram to join the discussion, catch up on our best stories or sign up for our weekly newsletter
